articles.author: Tori B. Powell
articles.title: Latin America surpasses 1 million COVID-19 deaths - CBS News
articles.description: The region accounts for approximately 29% of global fatalities.
articles.content: More than 1 million total COVID-19 deaths have been reported in Latin America and the Caribbean as of Saturday, according to data collected by Johns Hopkins University. The region — which accounts fo… [+2196 chars]
